name: Car Journey
overview: In Car Journey you are the owner of a delivery service, delivering parcels and packages throughout the country. The aim of the delivery service is to make money. The more contracts you can deliver on time the more money you will make. Before you try to run the delivery service you can go to the driving school. The driving school (levels one and two) allows you to drive each of the four vehicles around the road network of Britain, discovering how quickly you can get from town to town and how efficiently you can drive each vehicle.
